Actions.Text: REFERRED TO LIBRARIES AND EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY

Title: Includes public library systems within the definition of entities that are eligible to apply for local government efficiency grants
Summary: Includes public library systems within the definition of entities that are eligible to apply for local government efficiency grants.
LawCode: Amd ยง54, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to the inclusion of library systems within the definition of entities that are eligible to apply for local government efficiency grants
